Package game.behaviours

Class FindItemBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.behaviours.FindItemBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class FindItemBehaviour extends Object implements Behaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.

  • Constructor Details

    • FindItemBehaviour

      public FindItemBehaviour​(int types, char foodWater)
      An constructor which takes input of types to determine the location of the target and follow the target
      Parameters:
      types - int type 1 = Brachiosaur, type 2 = Stegosaur, type 3 = Allosaur

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      If the condition is met, the method is called to search through the whole map and find the ground base on the dinosaur type. If there is a fruit inside the valid location, choose the optimal location and step forward the target.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      Action move action if there is an target located else return null
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • distance

      private int distance​(Location a, Location b)
      Compute the Manhattan distance between two locations.
      Parameters:
      a - the first location
      b - the first location
      Returns:
      the number of steps between a and b if you only move in the four cardinal directions.
